Articles.Content:
Is there a way to temporarily disable staging? (The equal to putting a safety cover on the 'eject' switch.)

I keep accidentally hitting spacebar at inopportune times.

Edited October 23, 2013 by Jaxal1

"Mod + L Lock current stage (very useful before you accidentally hit the spacebar)"

I still find myself checking this page every once in a while: http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/wiki/Key_Bindings
Thanks! I missed it in the long command list.
